user.title: GoTo Connect Call Stats
user.description: Enter your GoTo Connect API credentials to access call statistics.

oauth.title: OAuth Authentication
oauth.description:
Please complete the OAuth authentication process.

1. Click the link below to authorize the application
2. Complete the authentication in your browser
3. Copy the authorization response URL and paste it below

Authorization URL: {auth_url}

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to GoTo Connect API
